description.zh-cn: 清朝和俄罗斯沙皇国于1689年签订的第一份边界条约，也是中国历史上首次在国际法精神下签订的条约。该条约以拉丁文为权威版本，规定了中俄东段边界，并一度阻止了俄国的东扩。
description.en: The first border treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and the Tsardom of Russia in 1689. It was also the first treaty in Chinese history concluded in the spirit of international law. The Latin version was the authoritative text, which defined the eastern border between China and Russia and temporarily halted Russian expansion eastward.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，由满族建立。在《尼布楚条约》中，首次在国际法条约文件中以“中国”（拉丁文：Imperii Sinic）之名作为缔约方出现。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, established by the Manchu people. In the Treaty of Nerchinsk, it appeared as a contracting party under the name "China" (Latin: Imperii Sinic) for the first time in an international legal document.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪至18世纪初的俄罗斯国家，是《尼布楚条约》的缔约方之一，当时正积极向西伯利亚和远东地区扩张。
description.en: The Russian state from the 16th to the early 18th century, a party to the Treaty of Nerchinsk, which was actively expanding into Siberia and the Far East at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，在位期间平定三藩之乱，并派兵与俄国进行雅克萨之战，最终促成了《尼布楚条约》的签订。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty. During his reign, he suppressed the Revolt of the Three Feudatories, dispatched troops for the Battle of Yaksa against Russia, and ultimately facilitated the signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间重臣，作为清政府全权代表领侍卫内大臣，参与了《尼布楚条约》的谈判和签订。
description.en: An influential minister during the Kangxi era of the Qing dynasty. As the Plenipotentiary Representative and Minister of the Imperial Guard of the Qing government, he participated in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间大臣，康熙帝的舅父。作为清政府全权代表之一，参与了《尼布楚条约》的谈判和签订。
description.en: A minister during the Kangxi era of the Qing dynasty and the maternal uncle of the Kangxi Emperor. As one of the Plenipotentiary Representatives of the Qing government, he participated in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国陆军大将、伯爵，作为俄国全权代表，与清朝代表签订了《尼布楚条约》。
description.en: A General and Count of the Tsardom of Russia. As the Plenipotentiary Representative of Russia, he signed the Treaty of Nerchinsk with the Qing representatives.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪末俄罗斯沙皇，与彼得一世共治。《尼布楚条约》是在其治下由俄方代表签订的。
description.en: Tsar of Russia in the late 17th century, co-ruling with Peter the Great. The Treaty of Nerchinsk was signed by the Russian representatives during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪80年代清朝为收复领土雅克萨，与入侵的俄罗斯沙皇国军队发生的一系列军事冲突。此次战役的结局直接促成了《尼布楚条约》的签订。
description.en: A series of military conflicts in the 1680s between the Qing dynasty and the invading forces of the Tsardom of Russia over the territory of Yaksa. The outcome of this battle directly led to the signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 1858年俄罗斯帝国与清朝签订的条约，该条约重新划分了中俄东段的部分边界，实际上取代了《尼布楚条约》的相应规定。
description.en: A treaty signed in 1858 between the Russian Empire and the Qing dynasty, which redefined parts of the eastern border and effectively superseded the corresponding provisions of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 1860年俄罗斯帝国与清朝签订的条约，与《瑷珲条约》一同确立了中俄现代东部疆界，完全取代了《尼布楚条约》。
description.en: A treaty signed in 1860 between the Russian Empire and the Qing dynasty. Along with the Treaty of Aigun, it established the modern eastern border between China and Russia, completely replacing the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国的后继国家，在19世纪中叶通过外交威胁等手段，迫使清政府签订《瑷珲条约》和《中俄北京条约》，取代了《尼布楚条约》。
description.en: The successor state to the Tsardom of Russia. In the mid-19th century, it used diplomatic threats and other means to compel the Qing government to sign the Treaty of Aigun and the Convention of Peking, which replaced the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 调整国家之间关系的法律原则和规则的总称。《尼布楚条约》的谈判和签订被认为是中国首次应用国际法原则处理对外关系。
description.en: The set of legal principles and rules governing relations between states. The negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk is considered to be China's first application of international law principles in foreign relations.

description.zh-cn: 天主教的主要修会之一。其派往中国的传教士在清朝宫廷服务，并在《尼布楚条约》的谈判中担任翻译和顾问，扮演了关键角色。
description.en: One of the major religious orders of the Catholic Church. Its missionaries sent to China served in the Qing imperial court and played a key role as interpreters and advisors in the negotiations of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙籍耶稣会传教士，服务于康熙朝。作为清方代表团成员，在《尼布楚条约》谈判中担任翻译。
description.en: A Portuguese Jesuit missionary who served in the court of the Kangxi Emperor. As a member of the Qing delegation, he served as an interpreter during the negotiations for the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 法国籍耶稣会传教士，服务于康熙朝。作为清方代表团成员，在《尼布楚条约》谈判中担任翻译。
description.en: A French Jesuit missionary who served in the court of the Kangxi Emperor. As a member of the Qing delegation, he served as an interpreter during the negotiations for the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 俄国历史上的第一位沙皇。自其统治年代开始，俄国加速了对西伯利亚和远东地区的殖民征服。
description.en: The first Tsar in Russian history. Beginning in his reign, Russia accelerated its colonial conquest of Siberia and the Far East.

description.zh-cn: 俄国自16世纪末期开始的对西伯利亚地区的长期扩张和殖民过程。这一过程导致俄国势力抵达远东，并与清朝产生直接接触和冲突。
description.en: The long-term process of Russian expansion and colonization of the Siberian region, starting from the late 16th century. This process brought Russian power to the Far East, leading to direct contact and conflict with the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝将军，受康熙帝派遣，于1685年率军攻入雅克萨，是雅克萨之战中的清军主要指挥官之一。
description.en: A Qing dynasty general, dispatched by the Kangxi Emperor, who led troops to capture Yaksa in 1685. He was one of the main commanders of the Qing forces in the Battle of Yaksa.

location.zh-cn: 俄罗斯外贝加尔边疆区

description.zh-cn: 位于俄罗斯西伯利亚地区的城市，是1689年《尼布楚条约》的签订地点。
description.en: A city in Siberia, Russia, which was the signing place of the Treaty of Nerchinsk in 1689.

description.zh-cn: 位于俄罗斯远东地区的一条山脉。《尼布楚条约》将其确立为中俄两国的一段边界。
description.en: A mountain range in the Russian Far East. The Treaty of Nerchinsk established it as a segment of the border between China and Russia.

description.zh-cn: 中俄界河，为黑龙江上游。《尼布楚条约》将其确立为中俄两国的一段边界。
description.en: A border river between China and Russia, and the upper course of the Heilongjiang (Amur River). The Treaty of Nerchinsk established it as a segment of the border between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 作为签约方参与了《尼布楚条约》的谈判和签订。
description.en: Participated in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk as a contracting party.

description.zh-cn: 作为签约方参与了《尼布楚条约》的谈判和签订。
description.en: Participated in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk as a contracting party.

description.zh-cn: 雅克萨之战是《尼布楚条约》谈判的直接背景，战后双方为解决边界争端而签订此条约。
description.en: The Battle of Yaksa was the direct context for the negotiations of the Treaty of Nerchinsk; the treaty was signed after the battle to resolve the border dispute.

description.zh-cn: 因领土扩张问题，双方在雅克萨等地发生多次军事冲突，直到《尼布楚条约》签订后才达成和议。
description.en: Due to territorial expansion issues, the two sides engaged in multiple military conflicts in places like Yaksa, reaching a peace agreement only after the Treaty of Nerchinsk was signed.

description.zh-cn: 于平定三藩之乱后，派遣军队进攻雅克萨，引发了雅克萨之战。
description.en: After suppressing the Revolt of the Three Feudatories, he dispatched troops to attack Yaksa, triggering the Battle of Yaksa.

description.zh-cn: 受康熙帝派遣，率军攻打雅克萨。
description.en: Was dispatched by the Kangxi Emperor to lead troops to attack Yaksa.

description.zh-cn: 俄国向西伯利亚及远东的殖民扩张，导致其与清朝产生军事接触，最终引发了雅克萨之战等冲突。
description.en: Russia's colonial expansion into Siberia and the Far East led to military contact with the Qing dynasty, eventually triggering conflicts such as the Battle of Yaksa.

description.zh-cn: 自伊凡四世时期开始，俄国加速了对西伯利亚和远东地区的殖民征服。
description.en: Since the time of Ivan IV, Russia accelerated its colonial conquest of Siberia and the Far East.

description.zh-cn: 条约的签订在一百多年内有效阻止了俄国向黑龙江中下游地区的扩张。
description.en: The signing of the treaty effectively halted Russian expansion into the middle and lower reaches of the Heilongjiang (Amur River) for over a century.

description.zh-cn: 《瑷珲条约》的签订取代了《尼布楚条约》关于中俄东段边界的规定。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Aigun superseded the provisions of the Treaty of Nerchinsk regarding the eastern section of the Sino-Russian border.

description.zh-cn: 《中俄北京条约》与《瑷珲条约》一同重新划分了中俄东部边界，完全取代了《尼布楚条约》。
description.en: The Convention of Peking, along with the Treaty of Aigun, redefined the eastern Sino-Russian border, completely replacing the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 通过外交威胁及军队部署，迫使清政府签订《瑷珲条约》。
description.en: Forced the Qing government to sign the Treaty of Aigun through diplomatic threats and military deployment.

description.zh-cn: 通过外交威胁及军队部署，迫使清政府签订《中俄北京条约》。
description.en: Forced the Qing government to sign the Convention of Peking through diplomatic threats and military deployment.

description.zh-cn: 《尼布楚条约》是中国历史上首次在国际法精神下，与欧洲国家按对等方式谈判达成的条约。
description.en: The Treaty of Nerchinsk was the first treaty in Chinese history negotiated and concluded with a European power on an equal footing, in the spirit of international law.

description.zh-cn: 耶稣会传教士在条约谈判中担任翻译并积极参与，对条约的达成起到了关键作用。
description.en: Jesuit missionaries served as interpreters and actively participated in the treaty negotiations, playing a key role in its conclusion.

description.zh-cn: 作为清朝全权代表之一参与《尼布楚条约》的谈判与签订。
description.en: Participated as one of the Plenipotentiary Representatives of the Qing dynasty in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 作为清朝全权代表之一参与《尼布楚条约》的谈判与签订。
description.en: Participated as one of the Plenipotentiary Representatives of the Qing dynasty in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 作为俄国全权代表参与《尼布楚条约》的谈判与签订。
description.en: Participated as the Plenipotentiary Representative of Russia in the negotiation and signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 《尼布楚条约》规定以外兴安岭为中俄国界的一部分。
description.en: The Treaty of Nerchinsk stipulated that the Stanovoy Range would serve as part of the border between China and Russia.

description.zh-cn: 《尼布楚条约》规定以额尔古纳河为中俄国界的一部分。
description.en: The Treaty of Nerchinsk stipulated that the Argun River would serve as part of the border between China and Russia.
